inn1.comm: starts with a typical short of length ball just outside off stump, Mahela drops the ball towards the off side and zips through for a single
a nice delivery from Vinay, a hint of shape away after pitching just outside off, Dilshan shoulders arms
closer to off stump this time, solidly defended back towards the bowler
cuts the batsman in half that one, curls in a touch and nips between bat and pad as Dilshan looks to block off the front foot, promising start this from Vinay
loses his line a touch, full and on the pads, Dilshan looks to clip that towards midwicket, off the pads and to the leg side
reverts to his preferred back of length outside off area, Dilshan allows it through to the keeper
he starts with a wide down the leg side, the ball swinging past the batsman's pads
better from Irfan, a length ball just outside off, defended off the front foot by Mahela
Jayawardene looks to defend this outside off ball, off the inside-edge towards the leg side

intentionally lofts this over mid-on, doesn't get as much power or timing behind it as he would have liked, the ball clears mid-on easily though, Mahela would have wanted a boundary for the risk he was taking there
nice and tight just outside off , left alone
this one jags in a touch towards Mahela, who works it to the leg side for a single
outside off, Dilshan goes hard at it, connects well but can't beat the cover fielder
dropped in front of point softly for a single, Dilshan quick to get across
gets the width from back of a length to lean back and smacks it with quick hands through cover
decent comeback from Vinay, hits on the pads with one that nips in, there is an appeal, but it looked to be going down leg
gets well forward and defends softly towards point
they take on Raina running in from cover with the sharp single, Raina dives in and pushes the ball towards the stumps but misses, would have been close had he hit
and again, drops it neatly in front of Raina and they charge across for the run
holding its line but provides width outside off, and is slapped wide of third man
more width even as it started to straighten outside off, Dilshan is going to go after it as always, he flashes at it, and a very thick edge flies to the left of third man
tighter line from Irfan, pushed from the crease towards cover
uses the movement into him from a fuller length on leg to whip in the air behind square leg, fine leg gets around to it
is hit on the thigh pad as he misses the work to one shaping in from a back of a length
missed out this time, he wanted to swing this length ball with the inward movement over square leg, but could not connect well, is not happy about that
rides the bounce on this shortish one and pushes towards point
gets well forward and pushes the pitched up ball to mid off
gets it to lift from a good length and move away a tad, he is surprised and defends off the high part of the bat
well bowled, away shape and bounce from just short of a length, Mahela is forward and beaten on the push
runs this full straightening delivery behind point off a thick outside edge
appeal for lbw as Dilshan is struck on the pad with one coming in with the angle, not given, could have been headed down leg
starts with a ball that seams away after pitching outside off, left alone
ooh, tempts Mahela outside off, a length ball that moves a hint away, Mahela is drawn towards that one, past the outside edge to the keeper, 142.7kph
Mahela was charging down the track, Umesh fires it full and wide, Mahela has to reach for it, times it well though, Kohli at point has to stop that one

a huge six though it was unintentional, the straight boundaries aren't too big here at the Gabba, Dilshan was looking to pull that 147kph short ball, a top edge sends it way over third man for six, near the players' box, Kulasekara throws the ball back
nothing unintentional about this one, crashes this past cover off the front foot, the ball speeds to the boundary for four
another thunderous hit from Dilshan, right off the middle, Raina throws himself full stretch to cover to stop what would have been another boundary
Mahela hasn't had much luck with this dance-down-the-track tactic of his today, again not too well timed as he sends the ball over extra cover
guides this one down the leg side off the pads for a singel
shortish and well outside off stump, Dilshan steers it towards backward point, Jadeja moves across to try stop it, but he misfields to allow a couple
lovely timing from Dilshan, but the placement isn't great, the ball races towards cover but doesn't beat the fielder
Dilshan is in the mood, hasn't been in the best of form in this format, but he effortlessly flicks this length ball off the pads to the midwicket boundary, couple of bounces and past the rope
defends off the front foot towards cover, no run
Sri Lanka in top gear now, Mahela moves across and whips the full ball from Umesh towards deep midwicket, not as crisply hit as Dilshan's boundary there in the previous over, but gets four anyway
a well-timed pull from Mahela this time, to a short ball from Umesh, Vinay does a decent job of keep that from reaching the rope, plants his foot in the way to make an old-fashioned stop
not too well timed from Dilshan, a shortish ball is sent towards square leg by Dilshan

not too sure what Dilshan was trying there, initially attempting to scoop the ball towards fine leg, but realises he can't pull off the shot, the ball is well wide of off stump and it is past the outside edge to the keeper
back of a length ball that swerves away, Dilshan is beaten by that one outside off
on middle and leg this time, helped down to short fine where Vinay cuts off the single
full ball on off stump, defended down the track
sneaking in towards the batsman, pushed towards mid-on, Dilshan wants one and sets off, Mahela doesn't want it and sends him back, Dilshan has to scurry back
good length ball on leg stump and heading down, off the pad to the leg side
this one snakes in towards the batsman, Mahela defends, off the inside edge
length ball just outside off, driven firmly towards mid-on by Mahela, who shouts 'No,' to let Dilshan know there's no single
end of a good over from Vinay, a maaden just when Sri Lanka were hitting their stride, a length ball on middle and off ended the over, defended to the right of the bowler
overpitched on middle and leg, Dilshan flicks it towards backward square leg
a lovely shot from Mahela, this was a bit short from Umesh and outside off, Mahela slaps it towards deep backward point
full ball on middle and leg, punched towards mid-on by Dilshan
sends in the bouncer this time, 144.6kph and just outside off, Dilshan sways out of the way
not the best of deliveries, that was slanting down the leg side, Dilshan wanted to glance it fine but it is off the pad and rolls towards the keeper
end of another quiet over, and end of the Powerplay as well, it was back of a length and heading for middle and leg, defended towards midwicket
short of a length and curls it back in a towards off, dabbed towards backward point
short of a length and on the pads, Dilshan nudges it gently behind square leg, doesn't hit it too hard and so has the time to sprint back for a second, 128.8kph from Irfan
better line this, just outside off, Dilshan looks to drive towards mid-off, mistimes it
132.6kph this time, a length ball curves in a touch towards off stump, another mistimed drive, this time towards the bowler
short of a length and well outside off, Dilshan muscles it towards sweeper cover
attempts the bouncer, 130kph, and that is too high to trouble the batsman, umpire calls it a wide
short of a length, pitching on middle and angling in towards leg, worked towards square leg
a length ball is defended off the front foot
Jadeja gets a bit of turn after pitching the ball outside off, off the outside edge and towards Tendulkar at short third man
a length ball, Dilshan waltzes down the track and powers that towards long-off for a single
another single towards long-off, much more gently done by Mahela, eases it down the ground
one more to long-off, Dilshan's turn to push it softly down the ground for a single
drops it a touch short, Mahela is quickly on to the back foot and slaps that towards deep point
a length ball swinging in towards off stump, defended towards mid-on
short of a length ball on middle and off, Dilshan opens the face to drop the ball towards point, calls insistently for a single, Mahela responds
on middle and leg, worked towards square leg by Mahela for one more, not too much trouble for the Sri Lankan openers here, moving along nicely
slides it down the leg side this time, off the pads and towards short fine leg
again on middle and leg, again an easy single towards short fine leg
ends the over with a shortish ball outside off, slapped towards backward point by Mahela

that one bounces more than anyone expected, it drifts in towards off stump, pitches and turns away, plenty of bounces as well, Mahela is beaten, Parthiv's gloves aren't near the ball as it hits his chest
works it towards fine leg for a couple
sliced towards cover for a single
length ball on off stump, not much turn this time, Dilshan drives it back towards the bowler
length ball outside off, slashed towards cover by Dilshan for a single
short and wide from Irfan, helped away towards deep backward point
pitched up and just outside off, punched towards extra cover for a quick single
short of length ball just outside off, drops it to the off side
back of a length ball, 130.1kph, defended from the crease to the off side
just back of a length, outside off, Mahela guides that toward deep backward point for an easy single, he is really strong scoring around backward point

a loud lbw appeal, seems like a while since India had anything to shout about, pitching on middle and heading for leg stump as Dilshan looks to defend off the front foot, that was heading over the stumps
length ball is worked towards square leg
length ball on the pads, defended back towards the bowler
short of length ball, not too far from off stump, Dilshan jumps away from the stumps and carves it powerfully to backward point,can't beat Kohli
on the pads defended to the leg side
Ashwin choking Dilshan with this round the wicket angle, no room on offer for Dilshan, defended to the leg side
final ball of the over, beat Dilshan, spins away from the batsman, the carrom ball, Dilshan can't get bat on it
a length ball is helped along to fine leg by Mahela
not too well timed by Dilshan as he pushes the ball towards mid-on, Tendulkar is on the edge of the circle which allows the Sri Lankans time to take a run
crisply driven off the front foot, can't get it past cover though
a slower ball from Irfan, 115kph, Mahela was charging down the track, Irfan cleverly bowls it a bit short, a slower legcutter, beats Mahela
a sharp single to mid-off, Mahela pushes the ball towards the fielder and takes him on, it was Tendulkar who was under pressure there
probably Irfan's quickest ball of the day, 138.2kph, a full ball on the leg stump, worked towards square leg
pitching outside leg and turning further away, would have been a wide if he left that alone, Dilshan looks to power it behind square leg, only gets a single
length ball on middle and leg, defended towards the bowler
extra bouncer there for Ashwin, Mahela is taken by surprise as he looks to defend, hit high on the bat and that is in the air for a bit before reaching the bowler
superb from Mahela, skipping away from the stumps to make room and then clobbers that ball towards the point boundary
way down the leg side and spinning further away
quicker ball on the pads, guided to short fine
keeps it full, on the pads, worked to square leg this time
delicately done by Mahela, that was on off stump but he backs away a touch and guides it towards deep backward point, a misfield by vinay concedes an extra run
Mahela is down the track, looks to thrash the ball, the ball rolls towards deep midwicket for two
cracks that towards point, sharp stop there

there's the breakthrough, Sehwag flies to his left at midwicket to pull off a stunner, roll on more "slow fielder" talk, Mahela looks to club this outside off short of length delivery over the leg side, doesn't get hold of it too well, Sehwag dives to latch on to that and brings Sri Lanka's threatening opening stand to an end
short of length ball on middle and off, defended to the leg side
pushed towards mid-on, Sangakkara thinks about a single, but decides against it
short of length ball on the pads, defended to the leg side
spins away after pitching outside off, Dilshan guides that off the back foot past short third man for a boundary, one short of his 50 now
a stifled shout of 'catch' as Dilshan defends to the leg side
fired down the leg side, Dilshan tries to help it behind square leg, he misses and that's a wide
defended off the front foot towards point
worked between the bowler and midwicket, probably a single there but there is some hesitation among the Sri Lankans and that's a dot ball
no doubt about a single this time, driven towards long-on, Dilshan moves on to his half-century, his 26th in ODIs
Jadeja returns, and fires it down the leg side, Dilshan doesn't offer a stroke as the ball rolls off the pads towards fine leg, a dead ball singalled
defended towards midwicket this time
pushed it wide of a diving Raina at cover for a single
tossed up and full, eased down towards long-on for a single, Sangakkara is off the mark
this one goes straight on with the arm, defended from the crease to the left of the bowler
end of a tight over from Jadeja, the final ball rolls off the inside-edge towards midwicket
a full ball is worked towards long-off for a single
a length ball just outside off, defended to the off side
on middle and leg this time, squeezed towards midwicket by Dilshan
spins in sharply towards the pads, helped towards backward square leg

and both well-set batsmen are gone, Ashwin has struck, this one was a length ball well outside off, not much turn for Ashwin but it bounced, more than Dilshan expected at least, a thin top edge through to Parthiv, and Dilshan's stay is over
spins this down the leg side, that's a wide
length ball on middle stump, punched towards mid-on for a single
tossed up and full from Jadeja, driven towards mid-off
a length ball is driven towards long-off for a single
short of length ball, defended in front of point
pitched up and on leg stump, driven towards long-on by Chandimal
another easy single, the ball is pushed towards long-off this time
Chandimal wanted two this time, he tucked the ball behind square leg and sprinted the first, still wasn't quick enough to have time to take two
defended to the off side by chandimal
looks to whip this towards midwicket but gets a leading edge towards cover
a length ball just outside off, defended down the track
short and wide, slapped towards deep point
well outside off, Chandimal pokes it towards backward point for a single
a length ball heading for off stump, blocked towards the bowler
tossed up, length ball on legstump, inside-edged towards midwicket
cramping up Chandimal with this legstump line, Chandimal manages to squeeze this towards midwicket
pushed towards long-on for an easy single this time
flighted by Jadeja as he bowls round the wicket, driven to his left by Sangakkara, Jadeja dives but can't make a clean stop
a length ball, around leg stump, defended by Chandimal
a wristy flick past midwicket gives Chandimal a single, another steady over from Jadeja, 5-0-18-0 now
a length ball, again on leg stump, helped towards backward square leg, Jadeja is quickly on to that
drops this a bit short, slapped back towards the bowler
played gently towards square leg, placed wide enough to take two, but Sangakkara slips as he turns for the second, so just the single
delicately done by Chandimal, plays it fine down the leg side, Jadeja makes a sliding stop near the rope
eased to long-on for a single, Chandimal has looked quite impressive this series
blocked off the back foot towards extra cover
on the leg stump once more, defended towards square leg
looks to whip this towards square leg, it was down the leg side, struck on the pads

wants to drive this down the ground, a hint of an inside edge sends the ball towards long-on, Tendulkar charges and to his right in to cut that off, Chandimal had wanted two but Tendulkar keeps them to a single
worked to long-on for one more
a length ball on legstump, not much turn here for Jadeja, defended to midwicket
a quite period of play continues, worked to midwicket to end the over

and he strikes first ball, not the greatest of deliveries, a shortish ball around off stump, Sangakkara stylishly pulls that towards deep backward square leg, that reached Tendulkar in a hurry, he didn't have to move at all as Sangakkara does a great job of picking him out, five yards either way and that was a certain boundary given how well he hit it
full ball swinging down the leg side, inside-edged towards the pads
Yadav grunts as he fires in a ball outside off, left alone by Thirimanne, a big test this for Sri Lanka's younger batsmen
a full ball on middle and leg, worked towards midwicket by Thirmanne, that was 144.7kph
short of length ball on the pads, defended to the leg side, Thirimanne wants one, Chandimal doesn't
a lovely stroke from Thirimanne to get off the mark, helps the ball with the angle, steers it behind point for four, pretty good shot to get off the mark
Jadeja keeps it full around leg stump, as he has much of today, driven towards long-on, Tendulkar fields again
length ball on middle and leg, worked towards short midwicket
tossed up, on a length, on leg stump, helped to midwicket
length ball again, just outside off to the left-hander, pushed to long-on for one more
a touch shorter, on middle stump, jabbed to the right of the bowler for a single
helped to square leg, straight at the fielder, so there's no run to be had
a length ball at 140.6kph, driven off the front foot towards cover
short of length ball on the leg stump, defended towards square leg
that was pretty quick from Yadav, 145.7kph, Thirimanne stand stall and opens the face to guide it past slip and fine of third man for four, not sure that was entirely intentional
slips it in short, just outside off, defended to the off side off the back foot
slower offcutter from Umesh, around 115kph, Thirimanne defends off the front foot to the off side
on the pads this time, Thirmanne wants to work that towards square leg but can't get bat on it
Jadeja continues to plug away around leg stump, Chandimal works it towards midwicket for one more
shouts of catch as Thirimanne plays it a bit uppishly towards midwicket
outside off this time, played with soft hands towards backward point for a single
louder shouts of "Catch" this time, tossed up by Jadeja, again around leg stump, Chandimal checks his shot and the ball almost carries back to Jadeja
spins away from Chandimal, for a change Jadeja bowls it outside off, chopped towards point
uses his feet to get to the pitch and works the ball towards mid-on for one
another easy-on-the-eye boundary from Thirimanne, overpitched and outside off, Thirimanne bends his knees and forces that past cover for four
Umesh bangs it in short, Thirimanne goes for the cheeky upper cut, for a few moments he would have wondered whether he hit that too well, he didn't, it lands short of third man
worked to backward square leg for one more
slower ball from Umesh, 114kph, solidly defended to the off side, that was on off stump from Umesh
shorter and down the leg side, Thirimanne looks to slam that towards deep backward square leg but can't connect
another slower ball, short of a length and curling towards the legstump, defended towards midwicket for a single to bring up the 150
full and wide outside off, punched off the front foot towards extra cover
again a loud shout of "catch," again it lands short of the fielder, it was Kohli, who was charging in to try take that, he ends up giving away a single as he overruns it
dabbles it behind square leg  for one more
length ball on middle and leg, towards midwicket, clean stop from Kohli this time
keeps it around leg stump, punched to the right of the bowler, Jadeja gives chases but can't stop the single
another tidy over from Jadeja comes to a close, worked towards midwicket by Thirimanne for a single
a length ball well wide of off stump, slapped towards point, a bit of turn there for Sehwag
Sehwag also keeps it on the pad, bowling from round the wicket, clipped to square leg
well outside off, slapped towards point by Thirimanne

well outside off stump, Thirimanne pushes the ball towards cover and sets off, Raina dives to his right to stop that, Chandimal is quick, quick enough to beat the throw from Raina, third umpire is called for, 'Not out'
poked towards cover for a single
slapped towards Jadeja at point, no run this time
Jadeja starts his final over with a wide down the leg side
length ball on legstump once more, pushed towards long-on for a single
round the wicket to the left-hander, punched back to the bowler
uses his wrists to work the ball from the stumps to backward square leg
Jadeja continues to do what has worked for him today, giving no room to the right-hander, Chandimal jabs the ball to the right of Jadeja for a single
width on offer, Thirimanne works this towards deep backward point for two, thought of a third but there's no time
this time there's three to be had, Vinay has a long chase from short third man as Thirimanne gets a thick outside edge towards third man
Vinay slants this from round the wicket towards the pads, inside-edged (I think) onto the pads, the ball rolls to the leg side
a short ball from Vinay, Thirimanne goes for the pull, not too well timed though, the balls rolls towards deep midwicket
over the wicket to the right-hander, plenty of bouncer for Vinay, shortish ball just outside off, Chandimal looks to upper cut that one, he misses, Parthiv collects that at shoulder height
dabbed towards cover for a single

Thirimanne gets his fourth boundary, a cheeky shot from him, a short ball coming in towards the batsman, who backs away to make room and jab the ball past the keeper for four, the fifty stand  comes up
length ball heading for the pads, defended to the leg side, six off the over, a decent one for India given that it is the Powerplay
short ball from Irfan, pulled towards midwicket for a single
fuller this time, heading for the leg stump, pushed back towards the bowler
full ball hurtling towards middle stump, thumped towards long-on for a single
short of length ball, slapped towards cover by Chandimal, a single is pinched

the third man area has proved very profitable for Thirimanne today, he picks up another boundary there, a short ball on middle and off, Thirimanne backs away and dabs it between the keeper and third man for four
slaps this towards midwicket for a couple
Ashwin from round the wicket, attacking leg stump, worked to midwicket
on the pads, worked towards midwicket once more

overthrows for four, Chandimal works the ball towards midwicket, Thirimanne had set off for the run, Raina was onto the ball quickly, he flings it in at the non-striker's end, Thirimanne would have been gone if that hit, it misses, and the two men backing up also can't stop that and that's Chandimal's first four
tossed up by Ashwin, defended
charges down and scoops this over mid-off, making uses of the field restrictions, though he hasn't hit it  too well, he gets a couple
Irfan fires it full and down the leg side, Thirimanne attempts an ambitious shot after moiving across the stumps, he doesn't connect but it is a wide
gets the yorker just outside leg stump, Thirimanne backs away and punches the ball towards mid-off for a single
short of length ball and curling in towards the right-hander, Chandimal shows off his talent again, a cute dab sends the ball towards third man
a slower ball, full and wide outside off, thirimanne was backing away from the stumps, he can't reach it
a big wind-up after which Thirimanne sends the ball towards long-on, the ball lands just short of the man in the deep

plenty of confusion there, a full ball from Irfan, Chandimal looks to carve that through extra cover, he isn't sure where the ball was, it hadn't gone anywhere, nestling in front of the stumps, batsmen wonder whether to take a single, Irfan races across to field and make sure there isn't a run

Irfan's yorker does the job, full and heading for leg stump, beats Chandimal and it crashes into the base of keg stump, ending an important stand, Sri Lanka fans will be thrilled seeing how well two of their youngster performed after the experienced trio at the top were dismissed
Ashwin's first ball is defended to the leg side
a length ball on the pads, worked towards square leg
slapped towards backward point for a single
gets forward and defends this to the off side
spins in from a back of a length, around off stump, punched off the back foot towards cover
Thirimanne plays it uppishly but between cover and point for a single
Mathews slaps this one behind point
thirimanne defends towards short midwicket
wide down the leg side, can Mathews walk up to Thirimanne and tell him to stay in the creases, perhaps he doesn't know the rules?
full ball outside off and that is pushed towards cover
on the pads, helped towards short fine leg by Mathews
length ball on the pads, helped behind square leg
just outside off, Thirimanne carves this one towards point for a single
a length ball on middle and leg is worked towards square leg for a single
short ball, Thirimanne goes for the pull, can't time it the ball rolls to midwicket
slapped towards point for a single that takes him to 49
Mathews sensibly works a leg stump ball behind square leg for one more
a length ball angling in towards off stump, defended down the track
length ball outside off, slapped powerfully towards wide long-off, Thirimanne had to dive to beat the throw towards the non-striker's end, if Umesh had collectedt hat cleanly that was a run-out
a short ball is monstered to the midwicket boundary, keeps it along the ground and beats Ashwin at the rope
slower ball, 120.6 kph outside off, pushed towards point off the back foot
short of length once more, Mathews skips beyond leg and pokes the ball towards backward point
slower offcutter to end the over, Mathews plays with soft hands towards point and races for a single
Thirimanne gets to his 50 with a push to long-off, his running may have been scatter-brained but his strokes has been superb, some very graceful strokes, and some inventive ones as well
pushed back towards the bowler
short of length ball outside off, guided towards third man by Mathews
short ball outside off, too close to cut
helps this down to fine leg for a single
that is down the leg side
quite close to the off stump, chops this behind Sachin Tendulkar at short third man, Sri Lanka move on to 224
a length ball is punched back towards the bowler
short of length ball outside off, slapped towards backward point by Mathews
a high full toss, slanting down leg, helped along to fine leg
Mathews looks for a big hit over mid-on, gets a top-edge and the ball swirls towards third man
Thirimanne walks across the stumps and cheekily works a short of length ball on off stump to fine leg, Thirimanne full of confidence here

dabs this down to third man, and hurries back for the second, the throw is wild, and once again Vinay proving expensive in the death, it has been one of India's weaknesses, an inability to plug the runs towards the end of the innings
low full toss on off stump, punched to mid-off for a single
more shouts of 'catch' as Thirimanne slashes the ball over point , lands beyond the fielder
length ball wide of off stump, worked towards long-off
Mathews defends this towards midwicket, Thirimanne charges down but is sent back
Mathews punches this towards long-on, immediately calls for two, putting pressure on the fielders there
defended towards point for a single

superb catch to end a fine innings from Thirimanne, a short of length ball, Thirimanne is down the track and carves the ball towards sweeper cover, Raina has to move to his left and tumble forward to take that one, well judged
short and wide, steered towards deep backward point, Yadav fires in the throw from the deep, good one it was, but Perera was too quick
shortish ball on off stump, defended towards point

short of length ball on legstump, worked towards square leg by Mathews, Ashwin's the fielder in the deep, batsmen decide to go for the second, Mathews is very quick, Ashwin isn't, and a dive ensures Mathews makes his ground
well outside off, guided towards deep backward point for another quick two, brings up the 250 as well
Mathews finding the gaps perfectly here, a short ball is whipped towards deep midwicket, a good throw from the deep but the fielder had so much ground to cover that the batsmen make it easily
ten off the over without hitting a boundary, a low full toss is slapped towards long-on for a single
short and wide outside off, tapped towards point for a single
Perera swinfs at that short ball, he's a big-hitter and has shown it several times against India, he doesn't time it this time though, gets enough to clear midwicket
slightly slower from Umesh, that sits up for Perera, who hammers it to the wide long-on boundary for four, pure power there
clubs this towards long-on, reaches the fielder on the bounce
calmly defended towards the off side for a quick single
not the best of overs from U/mesh, fires this down the leg side
a stifled lbw appeal, that struck him well outside off, and was angling further away, the ball rolls towards square leg
bowled him, how fast was that? a short of length ball that Perera wanted to slog to his favourite midwicket area, was too quick for him and that crashes into middle stump, 103kph from Raina that was
full ball on the middle stump, punched towards long-off for a single

dropped, tough one that, well outside off, Mathews was looking to swing that to the leg side, gets a thick outside edge and Parthiv can't react quickly enough, bounces off the gloves and Parthiv tries to collect it on the second attempt but his dive is in vain
wow! what a hit from Mathews, one of the flattest sixes you will see, powered over a leaping Kohli at long-on, Kohli tried his best but that was too hot for him
too far outside off, a free run
flighted ball is driven towards long-off for a single
drilled to long-on for a single
slapped towards midwicket for a single
short of length ball, very slow, 96kph, Mathews was surprised by that back of the hand slower one, defended down the track
poor delivery to follow up, slanting way down the leg side, more free runs for Sri Lanka
another leg side wide, a terrific take from Parthiv, moves quickly to his left to ensure it's only one
oh dear this is proving an expensive over, another one well down the leg side, Mathews gets a bit of bat on that and it is down to fine leg for four, Mathews has quietly moved on to 47 already
a slower ball, legcutter outside off, slapped towards point for a single
drilled towards long-off for a single
no he can't, a short of length ball is powered towards cover for a single, Sri Lanka end on 289, one more than Australia made two days ago, this is also the highest total for Sri Lanka on this ground

inn2.comm: Malinga starts with a short of length ball on off stump, Sehwag stands tall as he blocks that out towards point

oh boy, that is a big blow, Lasith Malinga bowls it short and wide, Sehwag can't resist that one, he reaches out and slices that towards deep third man, Kulasekara races across to his right to pouch that and sets off on a celebratory run, Sri Lanka tighten their grip on this game
Tendulkar faces his first ball, short of length on off stump, defended to the off side
Tendulkar gets off the mark by helping the ball along towards deep midwicket
nicely struck by Tendulkar, back of a length delivery outside off, sliced towards cover

half-volley on the pads, easy for Sachin to work that towards deep midwicket, Maharoof is off in pursuit,  he dives and keeps it in, rolls the ball towards Chandimal who was also chasing it, saves a run
short of length ball curving in, Tendulkar gets behind the line and defends
off the inside-half of the bat as Tendulkar looks to drive that towards the off side
Kula gets his usual slant in towards the right-hander, the movement takes the ball towards Tendulkar's thigh pad, helped down towards fine leg
length ball on off stump, defended solidly by Gambhir
length ball angling just outside off, defended to the leg side by Gambhir
Gambhir drops the ball to the right of the bowler, wants a single but Tendulkar correctly sends him back
short of length and outside off, left alone outside off
short of length and outside off, Tendulkar gets his first boundary, cracked past cover
too far outside off, Malinga looks to bowl the slower legcutter, can't control it
superb drive from Tendulkar, gets nicely forward and carves this past point for two
a stifled lbw appeal as Malinga fires in a yorker that was going down leg side
length ball outside off, Tendulkar reaches out and defends it towards cover
another lovely shot from Tendulkar, not much effort behind it at all, it was slightly overpitched on the pads, whipped towards midwicket for a boundary
Kula slides it wide outside off, Gambhir allows it through to the keeper
lovely delivery from Kula, gets it to seam away though he is bowling from round the wicket, Gambhir is beaten outside off
over the wicket now, Gambhir drops the ball to the off side, Gambhir thinks about a singel but decides there isn't one
gets forward and works the ball towards midwicket for a single, that's his first run as well
length ball starting outside off, jagging away instead of his usual swerve in, Tendulkar pokes at it but is nowhere near the ball
Tendulkar was closing the face of the bat as he worked the ball towards midwicket, off the leading edge towards the off side
superb straight drive from Gambhir, a length ball on off stump, punched past the bowler for four, confidently played
Maharoof pings this one in a little shorter, outside off and that is left alone
the famous Gambhir dab, towards gully this time, it was a shortish ball which Gambhir played from the crease
well outside off and that is left alone
drops it a touch shorter, Tendulkar pushes the ball towards cover
Tendulkar crunches this one off the back foot and past point for four, Maharoof gives him the width, Tendulkar accepts, he hit it in the air but in the gap
short of length ball angling towards off stump, Gambhir drops the ball at his feet and takes a couple of paces before returning back to his crease
outside off and that is left alone
Gambhir nearly dismissed there, he was charging down the track, Kula shortens his length and Gambhir can't adjust for the movement away, the ball sails over the stumps
defended towards square leg  by Gambhir
on the pads, Gambhir tucks it wide of midwicket for a couple, Chandimal does the fieldeing
length ball on off stump, angling away, defended to the leg side by Gambhir
shortish ball just outside off, Tendulkar tips it towards extra cover off the back foot, calls immediately for a single
fuller this time, on middle and leg, Gambhir punches it towards mid-on
short of length ball, on middle and leg, Gambhir tucks it towards deep backward square leg for an easy two
not as convincing this time, Gambhir closes the face and gets a thick leading edge, that luckily for him bisected cover and backward point
another outside edge, again the ball is in teh air for a while, wide of Dilshan at backward point
short of length ball, 137.6kph, Tendulkar shuffles across and defends the ball towards midwicket
Gambhir works this one towards third man for a single
length ball on off stump, watchful defence to the off side from Tendulkar
short of length ball outside off, Tendulkar shuffles across and solidly blocks it towards cover
beaten! Tendulkar ends up playing inside the line of a delivery that went straight on outside off stump

the wait continues, SRT remains on 99, he looked fluent as he has so many times over the past year, a short of length ball well outside off, Tendulkar is late lifting his bat, off the bottom edge and cannons onto the stumps, Kula is ecstatic, Tendulkar less so, and his legions of fans even less so
short of length outside off, Kohli shoulders arms
short and wide and slashed away and one bounce to third man, really sped off the bat
lands it outside the off stump and he safely leaves it alone
appeal for an lbw and that was missing leg, a bit too high as well
shapes to cut and he ends up chopping it to the off side
a bit short of a length and Kohli goes back at the crease and defends
goes right across his stumps and pats it back to the bowler
Kulasekara gets this one to just sneak past the outside edge, lovely shape away which asks Gambhir questions
nice comeback by the batsman, overpitched outside the off stump and he merely drives through the line and beats mid-off
gets it to nip away from the left-hander off the surface and that was close to being called a wide
a bit closer to the off stump line and he safely leaves it alone
drifts far too wide outside the leg stump, too wide to even chase it
tucks it off his pads to the on side
Kohli gets across and taps it down the track
gets across and punches it down the track to mid-off
bonus for India, short and wide outside the off stump, he had to stretch far across to chase it but he placed it well, past cover point
fullish on middle and off and he pushes it back to the bowler
comes round the wicket this time but Maharoof fails to learn from his mistake as he bangs it short and wide again, plays the square cut well wide of the fielders
Dilshan flings himself at short point to stop another potential boundary, Maharoof's got to be careful with his length
drops it with soft hands to the off side and sets off but quickly decides against the single

It's that man Kula again! Gambhir walked a few paces down the track to disturb the bowler's rhythm, the bowler bowled it on a good length outside off, Gambhir followed the angle and half-heartedly steered it straight to Perera in the region of gully
strays down the leg side and wide called
lands it just a shade outside off and left alone
a touch wider of the off stump and he safely leaves it alone
down the leg side, strays on the legs and Raina clips it off his pads and it was headed to fine leg
gets across and pushes it to the off side
stabs it down towards short cover and pushes for the quick single, Raina comes in the way of the throw and takes a blow on the shin
a touch wide outside the off stump and he's happy to leave it alone
short of a length on middle and he softly tucks it to the on side
a touch short again and he gets across and taps it to the off side
gets across and steers it down towards gully
Raina gets right behind the line and defends to the off side
action replay of the previous ball, stays back and defends
starts with a short of length ball outside off, lashed towards short cover by Kohli, a sharp stop by Mahela, Kohli remains on 0
length ball outside off, Kohli opens the face and defends to the off side
short of a length ball just outside off, dabbed towards backward point
Kohli gets his first runs with a punch towards cover, Chandimal dives to his right, gets a hand on it but can't collect
flicks this towards fine leg for a single
short of length ball on middle and off, solid defence back towards the bowler

a big appeal for lbw, nips in after pitching just back of a length, Kohli struck on the thigh as he looks to flick that one, seemed too high though, Kohli is in a bit of pain as that didn't strike him on the guard
shortish ball is flicked towards square leg for a couple
full and well outside off, a loose shot from Kohli, luckily for him it lands safely near fine leg
length ball is defended towards cover
steady on Suresh, looks to clobber the ball over long-on and out of the ground, the ball is angling across him and he misses
another big shot attempted, this time he connects, gets it over extra cover and picks up three

dropped, India';s batsmen living dangerously here, Raina looks to punch this short of length ball, takes the outside edge and flies towards Dilshan at backward point, Dilshan dives to his right but he can't hang on, Raina survives
solidly defended by Kohli, a length ball from Mathews
nicely worked towards deep square leg by Kohli, flicks it off his thigh pad
defends it off the front foot towards Malinga at mid-on, Malinga isn't the quickest, Kohli calls early for the single, and they get it comfortably
short of length ball around off, Raina pulls it towards deep midwicket for a single
starts with a short of length ball on off stump, pushes Raina to the back foot, defended
Raina opens the face and plays it dangerously close to the slip fielder, guides it towards third man
swings it wildly down the leg side
length ball outside off, punched towards cover
overpitched and outside off, driven crisply towards mid-off
shortish and well outside off, Kohli flat-bats it towards mid-on
length ball outside off, once more Kohli strikes it well but can't get it past the fielder, this time it is cover
pitched up and just outside off, driven down towards mid-off by Raina
deftly guided towards third man for a single
short of length ball sways away after pitching outside off, slapped towards cover by Kohli, who is struggling to find the gaps
pitched up delivery is flicked towards midwicket, Kohli immediately calls for two, and they get it comfortably
Kohli attempts to repeat the stroke but is beaten as the ball nips in between bat and body
well outside off, crisply hit towards point, placement once again not very good from Kohli
Perera starts the over with a 139.2kph, angling across the batsman, who defends behind point
pitched up and outside off, driven towards extra cover for a single
short of length and on off stump, Perera keeps hitting the 139  kph mark, defended towards cover
length ball outside off, driven towards mid-off and Kohli sprints a single
length ball slanting across, pushed towards cover, no run this time
defended towards point by Raina to end the over
length ball outside off, defended to the left of the bowler
short and wide, Kohli looks to slap that one towards point, bottom edges it to the off side
back of a length ball outside off, clipped towards mid-on by Kohli
length ball outside off, defended towards mid-off
well outside off, 125.5kph, left alone
a leading edge as Raina looks to work the ball to the leg side, the ball dribbles to the off side
Kohli plays his typical wristy flick towards mid-on, hops as he plays the stroke, can't time it too well, which gives the batsmen enough time to get a single
lucky for Raina, the Chinese cut for four, brings India their first boundary in a very long time, Rain was looking to drive that but gets a thick inside edge past the stumps
worked towards square leg for a single

dropped, an authoritative pull from Kohli, swivels as he sends the ball towards deep midwicket, then it seems like he has picked out Chandimal in the deep, comes at face height to Chandimal, who shells it, should have been taken, Kohli lives on
length ball is crunched towards mid-on for a single
a pitched up delivery is worked to mid-on for one more
Herath starts with a length ball outside off, defended off the front foot
punched off the back foot to the left of the bowler
drops it a bit short, Kohli looks to power this but can't beat mid-on
places this behind square leg for a single
think it was Herath's wrong 'un, spinning away from Raina, who pushes it off the back foot for a single
thumps this off the back foot towards sweeper cover for two
short and wide, 141.7 kph, Raina steers it towards third man for a single to bring up India's 100
Kohli defends this one towards point
Kohli looks to work this off stump delivery to the leg side, off the leading edge towards the off side
short of length ball, once more Kohli prefers to play it off the front foot, slapped towards cover, again Kohli can't find the gap
short ball outside off, slapped towards deep midwicket for a couple, these two are quick runners
length delivery outside off to end the over, pushed towards mid-off for a quick single
Kohli rocks on to the back foot and punches the ball towards mid-on to get a single that brings up the 50 stand
not too much turn here for Herath, a length ball is watchfully defended off the front foot by Raina
down the leg side, Raina looks to sweep it but he doesn't connect
length ball on off stump, punched towards long-off for a single
drops it a touch short, Kohli gets quickly on to the back foot and slams that to the deep midwicket boundary. there's no fielder waiting there this time
short of length and outside off, guided towards sweeper cover
length ball just outside off, Raina drops the ball just wide of the wicket keeper
full and wide, Kohli reaches out for it, sliced towards backward point
short of length ball on off stump, whipped towards deep backward square leg for a couple, that was 140kph
shortish slow delivery, 115kph, sits up for Kohli, who pulls it towards deep midwicket for a single
similar length from Malinga, Raina shuffles across the stumps and clips the ball towards midwicket

another drop, once more it is Chandimal, once more he was at deep midwicket, this time Kohli got a top edge as he went for the pull, he was sure he was going to be dismissed, Chandimal had a lot of time to position himself under the ball but he misjudges it, comes in more than he needs, then has to adjust, ends up spilling it to give Kohli another reprieve
pulls once more, this time along the ground and towards square leg
guides towards point for a single
pitched up and outside off, Kohli powers it off the back foot in front of point
length ball outside off, pushed off the front foot past point, Malinga shies at the stumps at the non-striker's end and gives away an overthrow
gets back in the crease and tucks the ball towards midwicket
spins away after pitching on a length, Kohli gets back once more and chops the ball towards cover
Malinga starts the over with a short of length ball outside off, worked to deep square leg
fires it full and well outside off, 145kph, defended towards the off side by Raina

the famous Malinga yorker, Raina is clueless about that one, not even sure where the ball is after he defends it, the ball stops dead in the crease after he edges on to his pads, Kohli smartly calls for a quick single
stylishly done by Kohli, whipped towards deep backward square leg
a 138kph bouncer, outside off and that is flat-batted towards mid-on, not too well timed by Kohli
pitched up and outside off, driven towards the off side off the front foot
skips away from leg stump and whips the ball towards mid-on
Raina was looking for the usual turn from Herath into the batsman, the ball doesn't spin and goes straight on past the outside edge
defended to the off side by Raina
gets well forward and works the ball towards square leg
punched along the ground towards mid-on for a single
short of length ball, only 115kph, tucked behind square leg by Kohli
plays this with soft hands, drops the ball in the direction of point to take a single
length ball on off stump, defended back towards the bowler
shortish ball is pulled towards deep midwicket, Raina immediately calls for two
back of a length and angling across, Raina helps it along to third man for a single
back of a length ball on off stump, clipped towards midwicket for an ambled single
length ball is driven to long-off for a single
tossed up, on a length and that is whipped just wide of a short midwicket
length ball is punched towards sweeper cover to bring up his half-century, his second of the series, and a surprisingly low number of boundaries
defended towards midwicket by Raina
gets deep in the crease and pushes the ball to midwicket to pinch a single
a mistimed swat towards midwicket for a single
tapped back towards the bowler, Maharoof dives to stop that one
length ball outside off, pushed towards mid-off for a tight single

the end of the partnership, Maharoof has struck, Raina is caught on the crease and is done in by the bounce, Raina looks to close the face and ends up popping a catch to short cover, India's already slim chances become slimmer still
full on middle and leg, driven to mid-on
short and wide, helped towards point by Jadeja
a short of length ball outside off, played with a flat bat towards cover
Kohli makes room and swats the ball towards extra cover
length ball on off stump, defended by Jadeja
pitched up and outside off, driven along the ground towards long-off
overpitched and on middle and leg, driven towards mid-off
defended towards cover off the front foot
on the pad, defended towards midwicket
length ball just outside off, defended to the off side by Kohli
slants in after pitching outside off, defended towards square leg for a single
short of length and angling across, worked towards wide mid-on for a single
keeps it tight around off stump, drops the ball to the off side and sets off for a tight single, Dilshan dives and shies at the stumps but he misses
well outside off, steered towards deep backward point
length ball on off stump, defended back to the bowler
length ball on off stump, defended off the front foot
length ball outside off, worked towards wide mid-on
this one goes on with the am towards the leg stump, whipped towards midwicket
full ball on the pads, worked towards wide mid-on for a single
shortish ball outside off, slapped back towards the extra cover
steers the final ball of the over towards backward point, calls for a single, Jadeja responds and just makes it in time
Maharoof slides it on to Kohli's thigh pad, guided towards deep backward square leg
length ball outside off, driven confidently off the front foot towards cover
short of length ball on off stump, squeezed out towards cover, Kohli wants one, Jadeja wisely sends him back
not the most pleasing of shots, he skips away from leg and then chases the ball outside off, slices it over point
superb hit from Jadeja, an over-pitched ball is drilled to the left of the bowler for four
short of length ball outside off, slapped towards point for a single
slower ball from Perera, 106kph, short of length ball is whipped over mid-on
slower again, 109kph, well outside off, a bit of a top edge as he slashes at that one, flies over backward point for four
Perera gets the one that matters, Kohli is gone as he attempts the pull, horrible timing, the ball loops towards Kulasekara at mid-on, surely the end of India's chances
solidly defended towards cover by Irfan
length ball is punched towards mid-off by Irfan this time
off the thigh pad and towards backward square leg for a leg bye
Malinga starts with a wide down the leg sid
worked towards backward square leg for two
just outside off, Jadeja steers the ball towards deep backward point

superb yorker from Malinga, once more an Indian batsman has no clue how he has kept it out, Jadeja doesn't get bat on that, hits his back show, the ball is rolling towards point, Dilshan is tearing in towards it, Jadeja is racing for one, Malinga is screaming for lbw, Irfan isn't interested in the single, Jadeja has to dive back to beat the throw, then gets an overthrow for his efforts
now pings him with bouncer, Irfan gets under it
length ball on middle, blocked off the front foot
not a great delivery that, a length ball going down the leg side, helped along to the fine leg boundary
overpitched by Kulasekara, drilled towards long-off by Jadeja

Irfan gets a boundary, a thick outside edgde past the keeper and down to third man, Maharoof puts in the dive to get a hand on that but it that rolls for several yards along the rope before finally touching it
that is too wide outside off, a full ball that Irfan can't get bat on
full ball outside off, punched towards cover for a single

Kula can't do a thing wrong today, even gets a wicket with a low wide full toss, a bottom edge from Jadeja as he looks to swipe that to midwicket and the ball crashes into the stumps, Jadeja is distraught as he walks off
worked to midwicket for a single
a full ball is driven toward long-off for a single
overpitched and outside off, crashed through cover by Irfan, he doesn't bother leaving the crease after he plays that, a powerful hit for four

nearly a run-out there, Malinga replies with a yorker outside off, the ball is squeezed towards the left of the bowler, Malinga runs after it and flings in the throw, misses as Irfan dives to try make his ground
a full ball sliding down leg, strikes Parthiv's pads
clips it to square leg for a single
full and wide, Irfan was hoping that was too wide to be legal, it is within the wide line though
overpitched and outside off, Irfan pushes the ball towards cover to pick up a single to bring up India's 200
full and too wide outside off
Irfan fights on, full ball that is swiped towards deep midwicket for four
another boundary, Irfan has the  fans waving the India flag at the Gabba, slams this short of length ball to the midwicket boundary, 81 off 64 needed
kulasekara keeps it full, drilled towards long-off for a single
a wide full toss, could have been sliced for four, just can't get it past Dilshan at backward point
Parthiv survives, he wanted to flick this one towards midwicket, leading edge towards short cover, loops just over the fielder
end of the Powerplay, that was outside off and edged towards third man for a single, 46 for 2 in that Powerplay
short ball and outside off, flat-batted towards wide mid-on, vacant spaces there
short of length ball outside off, guided towards third man for a single
flamboyant pull from Irfan, that was a shortish ball that is sent towards midwicket

catching practice this, three Sri Lankan fielders get under this, some confusion as they wait to decide who should take it, it is left to Malinga,  who clings on to it, it was a shortish ball that Parthiv wanted to slam towards midwicket, top edge and the ball went high and not too far from the pitch, Perera and Dilshan were giving Malinga company as they waited for the ball to come down
shot! Irfan pulls that authoritatively behind square leg for four, well played by Irfan
short of length ball on middle and leg stump, Irfan adjusts and defends to the leg side for a single
full ball is driven towards long-off for a single
pushed towards long-on for a single
a yorker on offstump, dug out towards mid-off for a quick single
shortish ball, calmly whipped towards deep midwicket for two
full and slanting down leg, off the pads towards square leg
a low full toss on the stumps, punched down the ground, Kula gets a boot on it
Malinga starts the over with a full ball outside off, punched towards long-off for a single
slower ball, 123 kph, looked like the offcutter, he sends the ball to his favourite area, towards backward point
overpitched outside off, crisply struck by Irfan, down to long-off for a single, Irfan has looked good this innings
a low yorker length delivery outside off, Ashwin bends his knees and opens the bat face to guide the ball towards backward point
pitched up and on off stump, whipped towards midwicket for a single
Ashwin was backing away, a short of length ball over the stumps, Ashwin pokes at it and a thin edge through to the keeper, Bowden raises the finger
full toss outside off, slapped towards point, substitute Sachithra Senanayake dives to his left to cut that off
punched towards mid-on for a single
short of length ball angling away outside off, Vinay chases after it and misses
in the channel outside off, Vinay wafts at it and is beaten
off the outside half of the bat towards cover
Perara gets this third wicket, short of length ball outside off, Vinay steers it towards Senanayake at backward point, Vinay is gone for a duck
full and just outside off, pushed towards point
full and well outside off, Irfan looks to chop that to the off side, doesn't connect, the ball bounces a second time before it reaches the keeper
Irfan impressing with the bat here, a full toss just outside off, Irfan dinks this over short fine leg for four
overpitched and outside off, slugged towards mid-on by Irfan
a terrific delivery from Malinga, a full one heading for the middle and off, kept out by Umesh
a yorker to end the over, Umesh keeps it out once more

Sri Lanka have won, Perera gets his fourth, not the best of deliveries, a juicy full toss and Irfan whacks it straight back to the bowler, Perera hangs on to it and Sri Lanka get four points, once more Umesh Yadav is not out, three days ago India were top of the table, now they are bottom of the table,
